messages.subject: Re: Help Please.
messages.msgSnippet: I believe the best representation of modern samurai is the pairing of the Chinese character for horse combined with the Chinese character for deer . ...
messages.messageBody:
I believe the best representation of "modern samurai" is the pairing
of the Chinese character for "horse" combined with the Chinese
character for "deer".


--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "sgt_fury72" <burns_inf@h...>
wrote:
> Hello all...
> I am new to the group and I was just wondering if somebody would
> possibly have a gif or jpeg or could find one of Japanese
characters
> for "Modern Samurai"... thanks
>
> Rob

messages.messageBody:
Hello all...
I am new to the group and I was just wondering if somebody would
possibly have a gif or jpeg or could find one of Japanese characters
for "Modern Samurai"... thanks

Rob
